commits.message: ADD: Integration serialization test. FIX: random failures in checkmarks test

Merge pull request #224 from levelops/lev-420

ADD: Integration serialization test. 
FIX: random failures in checkmarks test
Fixed trigger scheduling thread not catching top level exceptions

Merge pull request #69 from levelops/maxime-dev

Rebased with master

commits.message: Github: added back repositories to iterative scan

files.patch:
@@ -94,6 +94,7 @@ public IngestionEngine ingestionEngine(ObjectMapper objectMapper,
         ingestionEngine.add("GithubIterativeScanController", GithubIterativeScanController.builder()
                 .objectMapper(objectMapper)
                 .commitController(githubCommitController)
+                .repositoryController(githubRepositoryController)
                 .build());
 
         // --- Jira ---

commits.message: Jira: double checking the default val for onboarding scan days
Renamed confluence client test to integration test

Snyk Integration (#72)

* Snyk Integration

* Snyk Integration - PR Comment Fix

files.patch:
@@ -20,6 +20,7 @@ dependencies {
     compile project(':integrations:integration-confluence')
     compile project(':integrations:integration-rapid7')
     compile project(':integrations:integration-bitbucket')
+    compile project(':integrations:integration-snyk')
     compile levelopsCommonsLib('ingestion-commons')
     compile levelopsCommonsLib('okhttp-utils') // TODO fix this
     compile levelopsCommonsLib('spring-web-utils') // TODO fix this

@@ -1,2 +0,0 @@
-repoUser=maxime
-repoPassword=!fL3^&UW74!Py1$Q
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+apply plugin: 'java-library'
+
+dependencies {
+    compile project(':ingestion-sdk')
+    api levelopsCommonsLib('inventory-service')
+    api levelopsCommonsLib('ingestion-commons')
+    api levelopsCommonsLib('database-commons')
+
+    compileOnly libraries.lombok
+    annotationProcessor libraries.lombok
+    testCompile libraries.lombok
+
+    compile libraries.jackson_core
+    compile libraries.guava
+    compile libraries.apache_commons
+    compile libraries.apache_collections
+    compile group: 'org.apache.httpcomponents', name: 'httpclient', version: '4.5'
+
+    testCompile libraries.junit
+    testCompile libraries.assertj
+    testCompile libraries.mockito
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<Configuration status="WARN">
+    <Appenders>
+        <Console name="Console" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+            <PatternLayout pattern="%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%t] %-1level %logger{36} - %msg%n"/>
+        </Console>
+    </Appenders>
+    <Loggers>
+        <Root level="debug">
+            <AppenderRef ref="Console"/>
+        </Root>
+    </Loggers>
+</Configuration>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -13,6 +13,7 @@ include 'integrations:integration-slack'
 include 'integrations:integration-confluence'
 include 'integrations:integration-rapid7'
 include 'integrations:integration-bitbucket'
+include 'integrations:integration-snyk'
 
 include 'agents:default-agent'
 include 'agents:integration-test-agent'

@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+apply plugin: 'java-library'
+
+configurations{
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    compile project(':ingestion-sdk')
+    api levelopsCommonsLib('inventory-service')
+    api levelopsCommonsLib('ingestion-commons')
+    api levelopsCommonsLib('database-commons')
+
+    compileOnly libraries.lombok
+    annotationProcessor libraries.lombok
+    testCompile libraries.lombok
+
+    compile libraries.jackson_core
+    compile libraries.guava
+    compile libraries.apache_commons
+    compile libraries.apache_collections
+    compile group: 'org.apache.httpcomponents', name: 'httpclient', version: '4.5'
+
+    testCompile libraries.junit
+    testCompile libraries.assertj
+    testCompile libraries.mockito
+}
+
+test {
+    exclude '**/*IntegrationTest*'
+}

@@ -13,6 +13,7 @@ include 'integrations:integration-slack'
 include 'integrations:integration-confluence'
 include 'integrations:integration-rapid7'
 include 'integrations:integration-bitbucket'
+include 'integrations:integration-pagerduty'
 
 include 'agents:default-agent'
 include 'agents:integration-test-agent'

@@ -21,6 +21,7 @@ dependencies {
     compile project(':integrations:integration-rapid7')
     compile project(':integrations:integration-pagerduty')
     compile project(':integrations:integration-bitbucket')
+    compile project(':integrations:integration-snyk')
     compile levelopsCommonsLib('ingestion-commons')
     compile levelopsCommonsLib('okhttp-utils') // TODO fix this
     compile levelopsCommonsLib('spring-web-utils') // TODO fix this

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<Configuration status="WARN">
+    <Appenders>
+        <Console name="Console" target="SYSTEM_OUT">
+            <PatternLayout pattern="%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%t] %-1level %logger{36} - %msg%n"/>
+        </Console>
+    </Appenders>
+    <Loggers>
+        <Root level="debug">
+            <AppenderRef ref="Console"/>
+        </Root>
+    </Loggers>
+</Configuration>

+      error: true,
+      error_header: 'Rest API Error',
+      error_message: e.toString()
+    };
+    if (e.request && e.request.status === 400) {
+      error.error_message = JSON.stringify(e.response.data);
     }
+    yield put(addError(error));
+    yield put(restapiError(true, actionToBSMap[action.type].uri, actionToBSMap[action.type].method, id.toString()));
+    yield put(restapiLoading(false, actionToBSMap[action.type].uri, actionToBSMap[action.type].method, id.toString()));
+  }
 
 }

+import React from 'react';
+import * as PropTypes from 'prop-types';
+import { Card, Input, Label, IconButton, Modal } from 'shared-resources/components';
+import RegularTable from "components/Table/RegularTable";
+
+const ths = ["field","description"];
+const tds= [
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"."}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"Any character except newline"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"a"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"The character a"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"ab"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"The string ab"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"a|b"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"a or b"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"a*"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"0 or more a"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"[ab-d]"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One character of: a, b, c, d\n"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"[^ab-d]"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One character except: a, b, c, d"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"[\\b]"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"Backspace character"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"\\d"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One digit"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"\\D"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One non digit"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"\\s"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One white space"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"\\S"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One non white space"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"\\w"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One word character"}/>
+    ],
+    [
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"\\S"}/>,
+        <Label type={"description"} text={"One non word character"}/>
+    ]
+];
+
+export class RegexModalComponent extends React.PureComponent {
+
+    render() {
+        return (
+            <Modal
+                title={"Regex Guide"}
+                onCloseEvent={this.props.onCloseEvent}
+            >
+                <RegularTable
+                    th={ths}
+                    tds={tds}
+                />
+            </Modal>
+        );
+    }
+}
+
+RegexModalComponent.propTypes = {
+    onCloseEvent: PropTypes.func.isRequired
+};
+
+RegexModalComponent.defaultProps = {
+};
\ No newline at end of file

+import React from 'react';
+import {PropTypes} from 'prop-types';
+import {graphThemes, graphStaticColors} from "./GraphThemes";
+
+import {
+    Tooltip,
+    RadarChart,
+    ResponsiveContainer, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, Radar, Area,
+} from 'recharts';
+
+
+// Todo below color codes to be removed
+const RADAR_CHART_COLORS={
+    "label_text":"#5D6F8B",
+    "polygon_shape_color":"#1B2C3C1A",
+    "radar_one_bg_color":"#248FE626",
+    "radar_one_border_color":"#228EE6",
+    "radar_two_bg_color":"#E2392B1A",
+    "radar_two_border_color":"#E2392B",
+}
+
+
+
+const AreaGraph=(props)=>{
+    const theme = graphThemes[props.theme] || 'blue';
+
+    const generateRadar=()=>{
+        props.dataKeys.map(dataKey=>{
+            return (
+                <Radar dataKey={dataKey.dataKey} stroke={dataKey.theme.stroke} fill={dataKey.theme.fill} />
+            )
+        })
+    }
+
+    return(
+        <ResponsiveContainer>
+            <RadarChart fill={RADAR_CHART_COLORS.label_text} outerRadius={95} data={props.data}>
+                <PolarGrid stroke={RADAR_CHART_COLORS.polygon_shape_color}/>
+                <PolarAngleAxis dataKey="subject" fontSize={"11px"} cx={100} cy={250}  />
+
+                {/*{generateRadars()}*/}
+
+
+                {/*Todo removed below Radar components once generateRadars method is working */}
+                <Radar dataKey="A" stroke={RADAR_CHART_COLORS.radar_one_border_color} fill={RADAR_CHART_COLORS.radar_one_bg_color} />
+                <Radar dataKey="B" stroke={RADAR_CHART_COLORS.radar_two_border_color} fill={RADAR_CHART_COLORS.radar_two_bg_color} />
+
+
+                <Tooltip/>
+            </RadarChart>
+        </ResponsiveContainer>
+
+    )
+}
+
+
+
+
+
+export default AreaGraph

+import React from 'react';
+import { AntButton } from 'shared-resources/components';
+import {Icon} from 'antd';
+import "../../../assets/sass/light-bootstrap-dashboard-pro-react.scss";
+
+export default {
+    title: 'Ant Button',
+    // component: AntButton,
+};
+
+export const Button = () => <AntButton>Button</AntButton>;
+
+export const ButtonStates = () =>(
+    <>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}}>Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} type="primary">Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} type="dashed">Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} type="danger">Button</AntButton>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const ButtonSize = () =>(
+    <>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} size="small">Small Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}}>Default Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} size="large">Button</AntButton>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const ButtonWithIcon = () =>(
+    <>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} icon="download" size="small">Small Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} icon="download" type="primary">Default Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} size="large"><Icon type="download" />Button</AntButton>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const DisabledButton = () => <AntButton disabled>Disabled Button</AntButton>;
+
+

+import React from 'react';
+import { AntButton } from 'shared-resources/components';
+import {Icon} from 'antd';
+import "../../../assets/sass/light-bootstrap-dashboard-pro-react.scss";
+
+export default {
+    title: 'Ant Button',
+    // component: AntButton,
+};
+
+export const Button = () => <AntButton>Button</AntButton>;
+
+export const ButtonStates = () =>(
+    <>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}}>Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} type="primary">Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} type="dashed">Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} type="danger">Button</AntButton>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const ButtonSize = () =>(
+    <>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} size="small">Small Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}}>Default Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} size="large">Button</AntButton>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const ButtonWithIcon = () =>(
+    <>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} icon="download" size="small">Small Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} icon="download" type="primary">Default Button</AntButton>
+        <AntButton style={{marginRight:"10px"}} size="large"><Icon type="download" />Button</AntButton>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const DisabledButton = () => <AntButton disabled>Disabled Button</AntButton>;
+
+

+import React from 'react';
+import { AntInput } from 'shared-resources/components';
+import "../../../assets/sass/light-bootstrap-dashboard-pro-react.scss";
+
+export default {
+    title: 'Ant Input',
+    // component: AntButton,
+};
+
+export const Input = () => <AntInput placeholder="Default Input"/>;
+
+export const InputSizes = ()=>(
+    <>
+        <AntInput size="small" placeholder="Small Input" style={{marginBottom:"10px"}}/>
+        <AntInput placeholder="Default Input" style={{marginBottom:"10px"}}/>
+        <AntInput size="large" placeholder="Large Input"style={{marginBottom:"10px"}}/>
+    </>
+)
+
+export const DisabledInput = () =><AntInput disabled placeholder="Disabled Input"/>;
+
+
+
